titles.title: Armed Forces Reserve and National Guard Dual-Status Review and Modernization Act
Armed Forces Reserve and National Guard Dual-Status Review and Modernization Act

A bill to postpone the deadline for the completion of the conversion of certain military technician (dual status) positions to positions of civilian employment by the Federal Government, and for other purposes.
Armed Forces Reserve and National Guard Dual-Status Review and Modernization Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
